name: description
label: Task description
default: Try to guess the mysterious sentence
description: A guide telling the user how to do this task. If you see the flickering bug on the toolbar, set the Play Mode (below) to 'Allow user ... own sentence'. You can re-set it to 'Available Sentences' after editing this Task Description field

name: playMode
label: Play Mode
description: Select your play mode

options.label: Allow user to enter their own sentence

name: enableAudio
label: Enable "Audio"
description: Enable "Audio" for the sentences to be guessed?

name: questions
label: Sentences
description: Simply type the sentences/phrases/words to be guessed by the students. You may split word parts with a forward slash e.g. "An anti/constitut/ion/al act"

name: behaviour
label: Behavioural settings.
description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.name: enableRetry
fields.label: Enable "Retry"
fields.description: Add a "Retry" button when the game is over. This will simply refresh the current URL. It may not work in some environments, so please check on your platform before enabling it!

fields.name: singlePoint
fields.label: Score this activity out of 1 and give one point for any number of sentences guessed
fields.description: Uncheck this option if you want this activity to be scored against the total number of sentences.

fields.name: caseSensitive
fields.label: Case sensitive
fields.description: Makes sure the user input has to be exactly the same as the answer.

fields.label: Enable Number of words Choice
fields.description: Check this option to allow the user to select the number of words (per sentence) to guess. Do NOT check this option if your sentences make up a story!
fields.name: enableNumChoice
numRounds
fields.label: Number of rounds
fields.description: Minimum number of rounds before Solutions can be displayed:

fields.name: displayAudio
fields.label: When to display the audio buttons
fields.description: If a sentence has an audio attached to it, select WHEN you want to display the audio buttons.

options.label: Only when the blanks have been correctly filled in

fields.label: Display Guessed Sentences
fields.name: listGuessedSentences
fields.description: Check this to add each guessed sentence to a display list after each successful attempt. This option is useful if your sentences make up a story.

fields.label: Display audio and tip buttons in Guessed Sentences
fields.name: listGuessedAudioAndTips
fields.description: Select how you want to display the audio and tip buttons in front of each sentence in the list of guessed sentences.

fields.name: sentencesOrder
fields.label: Sentences Order
fields.description: Select the order in which the sentences will be displayed to the user. Do NOT check this option if your sentences make up a story!
